          </li>
    </ul>
  </div>

Responsive Grid

.advisor-tile elements contained within .advisor-tiles will be separated by a border. Control when they shift to the "tall" layout using a breakpoint- specific .advisor-tiles-tall-* modifier. Heights are normalized using leveller.js.

<script>
$(window).load(function(){
  var $tiles = $('.js-advisor-tiles .js-advisor-tile');
  $tiles.leveller({
    cssSelector: '.js-advisor-tile-actions',
    cssProperty: 'margin-top'
  });
  $(window).resize($.debounce(function(){
    $tiles.leveller();
  }, 250));
});
</script>
